page.title: 020TTERBOURNE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The grounds are 8748 sq m. The buildings are modern,being single storey with big windows. The main materials used were steel girders,breeze blocks,plaster board and wood. The main part was built in 1963 and the extension in 1976. The school has 1 Head Teacher, 1 Secretary, 6 class teachers, 1 part time teacher,3 kitchen staff, 3 dinner ladies, 1 lollipop lady and 192 children. The subjects learnt are maths English,history,geography,science,reli gious education,sport, P.E., music,art and craft. The facilities are and main equipment include:2 rounders pitches,1 football pitch,1 netball court,1 long jump pit,2 computers,1 colour T.V.,1 video,and a large library of fiction and non-fiction.
